titles.title: Class Size Demonstration Act of 1988
A bill to establish a program of demonstration grants to local educational agencies to promote the implementation of plans to reduce class size.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 9/16/1988--Introduced. Class Size Demonstration Act of 1988 - Directs the Secretary of Education to make demonstration grants to local educational agencies having elementary and secondary schools with large classes in order to demonstrate the advantages of reducing the size of classes. Sets forth grant selection criteria, application requirements, and audit requirements. Sets forth provisions for the Federal share of program payments. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1989 and thereafter to carry out this Act.
